entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
